body.raw:
{
    "RequestInfo": {
        "apiId": "null",
        "ver": "null",
        "ts": null,
        "action": "POST",
        "did": null,
        "key": null,
        "msgId": "8c11c5ca-03bd-11e7-93ae-92361f002671",
        "userInfo": {
        "id": 281,
        "uuid": "255d6b05-103d-4c13-a920-3b6b43fde75f",
        "userName": "ExXTRAMnkLL",
        "name": "mustak",
        "mobileNumber": "1234567890",
        "emailId": "xyz@egovernments.org",
        "locale": "string",
        "type": "EMPLOYEE",
        "roles": [
            {
                "name": "System user",
                "code": "SYSTEM",
                "tenantId": "pg"
            }
        ],
        "active": true,
        "tenantId": "pg",
        "permanentCity": "Kaikoo"
    },
        "authToken": "{{Token1}}"
    },
    "tenantId": "pg",
    "messages": [
        {
            "code": "{{code2}}",
            "locale": "{{locale2}}",
            "module": "Bank KB_ALPHA",
            "message": "123"
        }
    ]
}

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Combination of tenant, locale, module and code should be unique.");
